Reviews.Title: The truth about Nokia Lumia 610 and athers Lumia phones
Reviews.Author: Ramon David Morales "David Morales"
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is very good as a phone, but the comparison with another Nokia (not Windows Phone) this is the truth: Bluethoot not transfer the contacts, pictures, images or anything else, just for connectivity with some handsfree devices easy disconnects and fails much.The camera is bad comparing it with another cell of the same category.Internet browsing is bing based on 40% of the time you do not find what you are looking for, too often disconnected from the internet without warning.As I do not understand nokia company were positioned at the top in teams and lost his position.Buy this in your choice knowing that bluethoot not work, the camera does not work, with few applications and games for Windows Marketplace a phone with 256MB of memory and storage 4.01 GB of 6.21 GB Place the cell,  Windows Phone 7.5 as Windows and Nokia say update to 7.8 since January we are waiting to happen, because that date had changed then and until today no date available. If you want to transfer photos, videos, notes and contacts to a PC you need to install Zune, not directly as do the other phones.I hope will be helpfulRegards David M.

Reviews.Title: Great budget device
Reviews.Author: Bailey Stein
Reviews.Content: The lumia 610 is great phone for first time smartphone owners or people who just want a small little backup device. It isn't very high-end, but it is some of Nokia's best works.The device itself is beautiful. It feels great in the hand and defiantly attracts attention. The camera on the device isn't the best, but it does well on nice, sunny, beach days.The Windows Phone OS is lacking apps and some features, however the device is great to have as a backup, noting that you can use it on any GSM network, as long as it's unlocked of course. I think of the device as affordable and you won't be seeing matched quality to the iPhone.

Reviews.Title: The worst mobile phone I've had.
Reviews.Author: Jerzy_Modrak, Stockhom & Warsaw
Reviews.Content: I spent the whole day trying to figure out how to transfer the phone book from my old cellular, not a Nokia. Didn't succeeed. Took it to a specialist shop in the neighbourhood. It took the guy, a specialist!, half a day to do it! Will I buy a Nokia phone again? NO!!!!! Don't waste your time or money on this rubbish! One star is six stars too many! MINUS 5 stars would be appropriate!
